body_html:
Can this be reopened? I have a use case. In my case, I am trying to use cholesky decomposition to solve a system, however sometimes it is not pos semi definite in which case it throws an error. I would like in this case to use SVD.
I need to do this check on each sub batch, i.e. using tf.unstack and doing the solve on each sub matrix.
It would be nice to be able to do

result = tf.stack([tf.on_exception(_with_cholesky, _without)(...) for ... in tf.unstack(...)],axis=0)

I need to do this check on each sub batch, i.e. using tf.unstack and doing the solve on each sub matrix.
It would be nice to be able to do

body:
Can this be reopened? I have a use case. In my case, I am trying to use cholesky decomposition to solve a system, however sometimes it is not pos semi definite in which case it throws an error. I would like in this case to use SVD.
I need to do this check on each sub batch, i.e. using tf.unstack and doing the solve on each sub matrix.
It would be nice to be able to do 
```
result = tf.stack([tf.on_exception(_with_cholesky, _without)(...) for ... in tf.unstack(...)],axis=0)
```
